metadata.title: CVE-2024-35948 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bcachefs: Check for journal entries overruning end of sb clean section Fixa missing bounds check in superblock validation. Note that we don't yethave repair code for this case - repair code for individual items isgenerally low priority, since the whole superblock is checksummed,validated prior to write, and we have backups.
